title: Who's Paying? (GiGi Maguire and Rob Stapleton)
itunes:title: Who's Paying? (GiGi Maguire and Rob Stapleton)
description:
Today on the show we opened up the phone lines to hear what our listeners had to say about who should pay the bills of the house after our Eboni K Williams made a comment wanting her husband to pay for the bills during our interview with her the other day. Also, we had GiGi Maguire call in where she spoke about her show Beyond the Pole and Rob Stapleton called in to promote his stand up this weekend in NY. Also, Charlamagne gave "Donkey of the Day" to the supreme court of Arizona for their voting restrictions being upheld.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Today on the show we opened up the phone lines to hear what our listeners had to say about who should pay the bills of the house after our Eboni K Williams made a comment wanting her husband to pay for the bills during our interview with her the other day. Also, we had GiGi Maguire call in where she spoke about her show Beyond the Pole and Rob Stapleton called in to promote his stand up this weekend in NY. Also, Charlamagne gave "Donkey of the Day" to the supreme court of Arizona for their voting restrictions being upheld.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
